import React, {useState} from 'react' import { MDBBtn, MDBContainer, MDBRow, MDBCol, MDBAnimation } from "mdb-react-ui-kit" export default function LoanProductHero(props) { const image = useState(props.image) const productName = useState(props.name) const description = useState(props.description) return(

{productName}

{description}
